ground_truth: She looks out of a side window as rocks and crags skim past. Daylight falls through holes punched in the fuselage by another burst from the fighter. Bond nurses the stricken aircraft as the hunter swoops in for the kill and eases the floor throttle forward. The dying engines belch smoke, enveloping the fighter's cockpit. The transport moves to avoid the smoke, trapping the fighter between the larger plane and forcing it to slow. The fighter turns to avoid a collision and hurtles straight towards the rocks. He throws her a parachute. A red warning light shows generator failure. She opens the outside door for Bond, who gropes for his chute, then hauls on the stick to get out of the plane over the hill. As the two aircraft nearly collide, Bond raises the nose, gaining as much height as possible. Cargo strains in its straps, which snap back towards Camille. Both propellers give out under the strain. Bond drops down the vertical fuselage to Camille, grabs her, and they tumble out into space. He lets go of her parachute and dives for her as they and the plane continue to fall. M sits stony-faced. They are in the sunless steps of the sinkhole. He puts his jacket around her shoulders, stands, thinks for a moment, and then turns to her. They stare at one another until Bond breaks eye contact. She gives a small nod. He holds out his hand, she takes it and pulls herself up. They trudge through the chilly, rocky shadows and come to a rockfall. Bond kicks at some of the stones and picks one up, starting to climb up the rockfall. He comes to the top and pauses, seeing a huge underground lake. They walk down a tunnel with the roof held up by wooden supports. People cluster around, queuing for water, and argue amongst themselves. A man climbs up to peer into the well, but it is dry. A standpipe stops dribbling. The bus arrives at the dying town. A small group of people, joined by Bond and Camille, get on board. The bus's red tail lights shine through the dusty environment. Covered in dust, they arrive at the Grand Hotel. He heads unhurriedly upstairs, makes his way across the landing, and approaches the door of his room, pushing it open. He bursts into the bedroom, finding Fields' body on the bed covered in black oil. He is frisked and escorted out but then breaks another's knee and lays out a third. He grabs the keys, unlocks his handcuffs, and frisks his would-be captors. As the lift doors open, he cocks the automatic and calmly slips it into the waistband of his trousers at the small of his back.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: She gazes out of a lateral pane as stones and cliffs skim past. Sunlight cascades through gaps punctured in the fuselage by another volley from the combatant. Bond tends to the afflicted aircraft as the predator swoops in for the kill and nudges the floor accelerator forward. The failing engines expel fumes, shrouding the fighter's cockpit. The transport maneuvers to bypass the smoke, trapping the fighter between the larger craft and compelling it to decelerate. The fighter veers to avert a collision and races directly towards the stones. He tosses her a parachute. A crimson alert light indicates generator malfunction. She opens the exterior door for Bond, who fumbles for his chute, then pulls on the lever to evacuate the plane over the mound. As the two aircraft nearly collide, Bond elevates the nose, attaining as much altitude as feasible. Freight strains in its bindings, which snap back towards Camille. Both propellers fail under the stress. Bond drops down the perpendicular fuselage to Camille, seizes her, and they plunge out into space. He releases her parachute and plunges for her as they and the plane persist in descending. M sits impassively. They are in the shadowy steps of the sinkhole. He drapes his jacket around her shoulders, rises, ponders momentarily, and then turns to her. They gaze at one another until Bond breaks eye contact. She gives a slight nod. He extends his hand, she takes it and pulls herself upright. They trudge through the cold, jagged shadows and arrive at a rockslide. Bond kicks at some of the pebbles and picks one up, commencing to climb up the rockslide. He reaches the summit and pauses, observing an enormous subterranean lake. They traverse down a passage with the ceiling supported by wooden buttresses. People gather around, queuing for water, and debate amongst themselves. A man climbs up to glance into the well, but it is arid. A standpipe ceases trickling. The bus arrives at the moribund town. A small group of people, joined by Bond and Camille, board. The bus's red rear lights gleam through the dusty surroundings. Covered in dust, they arrive at the Grand Hotel. He proceeds leisurely upstairs, makes his way across the landing, and approaches the door of his chamber, pushing it open. He bursts into the bedroom, discovering Fields' body on the bed covered in black oil. He is frisked and escorted out but then breaks another's knee and subdues a third. He grabs the keys, unlocks his handcuffs, and frisks his would-be captors. As the elevator doors open, he cocks the automatic and calmly slips it into the waistband of his trousers at the small of his back.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: She looks out of a side window as rocks and crags are skimmed past by her. Holes punched in the fuselage by another burst from the fighter allow daylight to fall through. The stricken aircraft is nursed by Bond as the hunter swoops in for the kill and the floor throttle is eased forward by him. Smoke is belched by the dying engines, enveloping the fighter's cockpit. The smoke is avoided by the transport, trapping the fighter between the larger plane and forcing a slowdown. The fighter avoids a collision by turning and hurtles straight towards the rocks. She is thrown a parachute by him. Generator failure is shown by a red warning light. The outside door is opened by her for Bond, who gropes for his chute, then hauls on the stick to exit the plane over the hill. As the two aircraft nearly collide, the nose is raised by Bond, gaining as much height as possible. Cargo binds in its straps, snapping back towards Camille. Both propellers give out under the strain. Bond drops down the vertical fuselage to Camille, grabs her, and they tumble out into space. Her parachute is let go of by him and he dives for her as they and the plane continue to fall. M sits stony-faced. They are located in the sunless steps of the sinkhole. His jacket is put around her shoulders by him, he stands, thinks for a moment, and then turns to her. They stare at one another until eye contact is broken by Bond. A small nod is given by her. His hand is held out by him, it is taken by her and she pulls herself up. The chilly, rocky shadows are trudged through by them and a rockfall is reached. Some of the stones are kicked at by Bond and he picks one up, starting to climb up the rockfall. He comes to the top and pauses, seeing a huge underground lake. They walk down a tunnel with wooden supports holding up the roof. People cluster around, queue for water, and argue amongst themselves. A man peering into the well finds it dry after he climbs up. A standpipe stops dribbling. The dying town is arrived at by the bus. A small group of people, joined by Bond and Camille, board it. The dusty environment is illuminated by the bus's red tail lights. Covered in dust, the Grand Hotel is reached by them. He unhurriedly heads upstairs, makes his way across the landing, and approaches the door of his room, pushing it open. The bedroom is burst into by him, and Fields' body is found on the bed covered in black oil. He frisks and is escorted out but then breaks another's knee and lays out a third. The keys are grabbed by him, his handcuffs are unlocked by him, and his would-be captors are frisked by him. As the lift doors open, the automatic is cocked by him and calmly slipped into the waistband of his trousers at the small of his back.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: She gazes out the side window as rocks rush by. Daylight shines through fuselage holes made by another fighter burst. Bond manages the damaged aircraft as the pursuing fighter closes in, advancing the throttle. The engines belch smoke, shrouding the fighter's cockpit. The transport maneuvers to trap the fighter, forcing it to slow. The fighter avoids a crash by veering towards the rocks. Bond throws her a parachute. A generator failure warning light flashes. She opens the door for Bond, who grabs his chute and pulls the stick, trying to clear the hill. As the aircraft nearly collide, Bond lifts the nose for height. Cargo strains and snaps the straps near Camille. Propellers fail, and Bond drops to Camille, grabbing her as they tumble from the plane. He releases her parachute and dives, both falling with the plane. M watches, stone-faced. They end in the sunless sinkhole steps. Bond drapes his jacket on her, stands, then faces her. They lock eyes until Bond looks away. She nods, takes his hand, and rises. They navigate the cold, rocky shadows to a rockfall. Bond kicks stones, picks one, and climbs. At the top, he spots a vast underground lake. They proceed through a tunnel supported by wooden beams. People gather, arguing over water. A man peers into a dry well as a standpipe stops dribbling. They board a bus to the failing town. The bus's red tail lights cut through the dust. Covered in dust, they reach the Grand Hotel. Bond goes upstairs, crosses the landing, and pushes open his room door, discovering Fields' body on the bed covered in black oil. He's frisked and escorted out but disables an attacker, seizes keys, frees himself, and searches his captors. As lift doors open, he readies his gun and discreetly tucks it into his waistband.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: She gazes out the window as rocks skim past. Daylight streams through fuselage holes caused by a fighter's attack. Bond maneuvers the damaged aircraft as the fighter closes in. Engines belch smoke, enveloping the fighter's cockpit, forcing it to slow down to avoid collision and veer towards rocks. He hands her a parachute. A red light warns of generator failure. She opens the door for Bond, who gets his chute and pulls the stick to climb. As aircraft nearly collide, Bond gains height; cargo straps snap. Propellers fail, Bond grabs her, and they tumble into space. He releases her parachute and dives after her. M watches from the sinkhole. He helps her up, they walk to a rockfall, and Bond climbs to see a vast underground lake. They move through a tunnel, find a dry well, and join people on a bus in a dying town. Arriving at the Grand Hotel, Bond finds Fields' body in oil. He is frisked and escorted out but fights back, unlocks handcuffs, and searches captors. The lift doors open, he readies his gun and conceals it in his trousers.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: She peers out from a side window of the aircraft, observing as jagged rocks and rugged crags streak by in a blur. The daylight streams through the fuselage's openings, which are the result of the fighter plane's relentless bursts of fire. Bond carefully pilots the damaged aircraft, skillfully maintaining control even as the aggressive fighter closes in, ready to deliver the final blow. With determination, Bond nudges the floor throttle forward. The engines, struggling against their imminent failure, belch thick smoke, which envelops the fighter's cockpit in a dark cloud. The transport aircraft maneuvers strategically, using the smoke to its advantage, trapping the fighter between it and the larger plane, forcing the smaller aircraft to reduce its speed. In a frantic attempt to avoid a catastrophic collision, the fighter veers sharply, careening headlong towards the rocks. In the tense moment, Bond tosses her a parachute. A glaring red warning light flickers, signaling generator failure. She quickly opens the external door, allowing Bond to grab his chute. He then pulls forcefully on the control stick, trying to lift the plane over the looming hill. As the two aircraft narrowly miss each other, Bond elevates the nose, striving to gain every bit of altitude possible. The cargo, secured by strained straps, snaps back towards Camille. Both propellers, unable to withstand the intense pressure, falter and cease to function. Bond descends the vertical fuselage to Camille's side, seizes her, and together they tumble from the aircraft into the vastness of space. He releases her parachute and plunges after her as they and the plane continue their downward spiral. M remains impassive, her face a mask of stone. They find themselves amidst the sunless expanse of the sinkhole's steps. Bond drapes his jacket around her shoulders, rises thoughtfully, and after a pause, turns his focus to her. Their eyes lock in a silent exchange until Bond looks away. She gives a slight nod of acknowledgment. He extends his hand, which she grasps, allowing him to help her to her feet. Moving through the chilly, rocky shadows, they reach a rockfall. Bond kicks at a few stones, selects one, and starts climbing the rocky incline. Upon reaching the summit, he halts, staring in awe at a vast underground lake spread out before him. They proceed down a tunnel, its ceiling supported by wooden beams. People gather in clusters, forming lines for water and bickering among themselves. A man climbs up to peer into the depths of the well, but it is bone dry. Nearby, a standpipe halts its last few drips. The bus rolls into the desolate town. Bond and Camille join a small group of people and board the vehicle. The bus's red tail lights glow faintly through the dusty surroundings. Covered in dust, they arrive at the imposing Grand Hotel. Leisurely, he ascends the stairs, crosses the landing, and approaches the door to his room, pushing it open with urgency. He bursts into the bedroom, his eyes falling on Fields' lifeless form on the bed, smeared with black oil. He is swiftly frisked and escorted away, but he retaliates, incapacitating one with a knee strike and rendering another unconscious. He seizes the keys, unlocks his handcuffs, and searches his would-be captors. As the elevator doors part, he readies his automatic, efficiently sliding it into the waistband at the small of his back.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: She peers out from a small side window of the aircraft, intently observing as the jagged rocks and rugged, uneven crags blur past in a rapid streak. The bright daylight streams through the openings in the aircraft's fuselage, openings that are a direct result of the relentless bursts of fire from the pursuing fighter plane. Bond carefully and skillfully pilots the damaged aircraft, maintaining a fragile control even as the aggressive fighter closes in aggressively, poised and ready to deliver what might be the final blow. With unwavering determination, Bond nudges the floor throttle forward. The engines, struggling and straining against their imminent failure, belch out thick, heavy smoke, which quickly envelops the fighter's cockpit in a dense, dark cloud. The transport aircraft maneuvers strategically, using the obscuring smoke to its tactical advantage, effectively trapping the pursuing fighter between itself and the larger plane, forcing the smaller and more agile aircraft to reduce its speed considerably. In a frantic and desperate attempt to avoid a catastrophic collision, the fighter veers sharply to the side, careening headlong towards the threatening rocks. In that tense, pivotal moment, Bond tosses her a parachute. A glaring red warning light begins to flicker, signaling a critical generator failure. She quickly opens the external door, allowing Bond the opportunity to grab his own chute. He then pulls forcefully on the control stick, trying with all his might to lift the plane over the looming, threatening hill. As the two aircraft narrowly miss each other in a dangerous dance, Bond elevates the nose, striving to gain every possible bit of altitude. The cargo, secured precariously by strained straps, snaps back towards Camille. Both propellers, unable to withstand the intense pressure, falter and eventually cease to function altogether. Bond descends the vertical fuselage to Camille's side, seizes her, and together, they tumble from the aircraft into the vast openness of space. He releases her parachute and plunges after her as they, along with the plane, continue their uncontrolled downward spiral. M remains impassive, her face a mask of stone, displaying no emotion. They find themselves amidst the shadowy, sunless expanse of the sinkhole's steps. Bond drapes his jacket protectively around her shoulders, rises thoughtfully, and after a brief pause, turns his focus to her. Their eyes lock in a silent, unspoken exchange until Bond looks away. She gives a slight, understanding nod of acknowledgment. He extends his hand, which she accepts, allowing him to help her up to her feet. Moving cautiously through the chilly, rocky shadows, they reach a daunting rockfall. Bond kicks at a few loose stones, selects one carefully, and starts climbing the steep rocky incline. Upon reaching the summit, he halts, staring in awe and wonder at a vast underground lake spread out magnificently before him. They proceed down a long tunnel, its ceiling supported by rough wooden beams. People gather in small clusters, forming lines for water and bickering among themselves in frustration. A man climbs up to peer down into the depths of the well, but it is bone dry, devoid of moisture. Nearby, a standpipe dribbles its last few, precious drips. The bus rolls into the desolate, barren town. Bond and Camille seamlessly join a small group of people and board the vehicle. The bus's red tail lights glow faintly through the dusty, subdued surroundings. Covered in a layer of dust, they arrive at the imposing structure of the Grand Hotel. Leisurely and with purpose, he ascends the stairs, crosses the landing with intent, and approaches the door to his room, pushing it open with urgency. He bursts into the bedroom, his eyes immediately falling on Fields' lifeless form sprawled on the bed, smeared with black, glistening oil. He is swiftly frisked and escorted away, but he retaliates swiftly, incapacitating one guard with a powerful knee strike and rendering another unconscious. He seizes the keys, unlocks his confining handcuffs, and diligently searches his would-be captors. As the elevator doors part, he readies his automatic, efficiently sliding it into the waistband at the small of his back.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: She gazes intently out of a side window, watching as rocks and crags blur by, their sharp profiles skimming past at high speed. Streams of daylight pour through the perforations in the fuselage, each a testament to the violence of another burst from the pursuing fighter. Meanwhile, Bond, with unwavering focus, carefully tends to the faltering aircraft, feeling the urgency of their situation as the hunter plane closes in, ready for the kill. He adjusts his grip and gently nudges the floor throttle forward, striving to coax every last ounce of power from the dying engines. Smoke erupts from them, forming thick clouds that engulf the cockpit of the fighter, temporarily obscuring its vision. Seizing the moment, Bond maneuvers the larger transport to dodge the smoke, cleverly positioning the fighter between their planes and compelling it to slow down to avoid a crash. In response, the fighter veers away sharply, its trajectory shifting dangerously close to the jagged rocks below. With swift reflexes, he tosses a parachute in her direction just as a red light blinks ominously on the console, signaling a generator malfunction. She swiftly unlatches the outside door for Bond, who desperately reaches for his parachute before pulling on the control stick with all his strength to climb above the hill. As the two aircraft flirt with disaster, Bond jerks the nose of his craft upward, eking out every bit of altitude possible. The cargo inside strains against its bindings, and the tension causes the straps to snap back near Camille. Simultaneously, the propellers, under immense strain, cease functioning entirely. Bond swiftly makes his way down the vertical fuselage towards Camille, catching hold of her, and together they tumble out into the void. In the frenzy of freefall, he releases her parachute and then dives again to catch her, all while the plane hurtles downwards. Meanwhile, M sits unmoved, watching from the sunless recesses of the sinkhole. With a protective gesture, Bond drapes his jacket over her shoulders, stands thoughtfully for a moment, and turns to her. They exchange a silent, understanding gaze until Bond eventually looks away. She acknowledges with a brief nod, at which point he extends his hand, and she grasps it to pull herself to her feet. Together, they navigate the cold, rocky shadows, eventually reaching the base of a rockfall. Bond uses his foot to nudge a few loose stones, then picks one up and begins his ascent. Reaching the top, he briefly halts, captivated by the sight of a vast underground lake. Their journey continues down a tunnel, its ceiling supported by rustic wooden beams. Along the way, they pass groups of people assembling in queues, clamoring for water amid rising tensions. A man clambers up to peer into a well, only to find it desiccated, and a nearby standpipe ceases its last few drops. Shortly after, a bus arrives in the decaying town, collecting a small crowd, which now includes Bond and Camille, who board together. As the bus makes its departure, its red tail lights cast a glow through the dust-laden air. Layered in dust themselves, they reach the Grand Hotel. Bond ascends the stairs with unhurried steps, crosses the landing, and approaches his room. He pushes the door open and bursts into the bedroom, confronting Fields' lifeless form lying on the bed, eerily covered in black oil. Moments later, he is frisked and led away but quickly spins into action, shattering another's knee and incapacitating a third person. Seizing control, he snatches up the keys, unfetters himself from the handcuffs, and proceeds to frisk his erstwhile captors. As the elevator doors slide open, Bond discreetly chambers his gun, sliding it into the waistband of his trousers, positioning it securely against the small of his back, ready for whatever comes next.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: She watches rocks and crags skim past the side window as daylight streams through fuselage holes caused by a fighter's gunfire. Bond expertly maneuvers the smoking, damaged aircraft, using smoke to force the pursuing fighter into evasive action, causing it to veer toward the rocks. He hands her a parachute just as a generator failure is indicated by a red warning light. She opens the door for Bond, who quickly secures his parachute and pulls up on the stick, gaining height to clear the hill before the planes nearly collide. As the cargo straps fail and propellers stop, Bond drops to Camille, seizing her as they tumble out into open air, with Bond releasing her parachute mid-fall and diving after her. After they land, he wraps his jacket around her shoulders and contemplates their next move. They share a silent understanding, and she accepts his hand to stand. Together, they navigate the shadowy terrain to a rockfall, where Bond kicks aside stones and climbs up to discover a vast underground lake. They proceed down a wooden-supported tunnel, witnessing people gathered around an empty well and dry standpipe. Reaching the dying town, they join others boarding a bus, its red tail lights contrasting against the dusty backdrop. Arriving at the Grand Hotel, covered in dust, Bond ascends to his room and discovers Fields' lifeless, oil-covered body. After being frisked and restrained, he effectively subdues his captors, retrieves the keys, and unlocks his handcuffs. As the elevator doors open, he discreetly places a cocked automatic in his waistband, prepared for his next move.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: She looks out of a side window as rocks and crags skim past, reminiscent of the rugged terrain of the Andean mountains. Daylight falls through holes punched in the fuselage by another burst from the fighter, a nimble jet designed for air combat. Bond nurses the stricken aircraft, a vintage Douglas DC-3 known for its resilience, as the hunter, an advanced F-16 Fighting Falcon, swoops in for the kill and eases the floor throttle forward. The dying engines, once the pride of civil aviation, belch smoke, enveloping the fighter's cockpit. The transport plane moves to avoid the smoke, a tactic used by experienced pilots, trapping the fighter between the larger plane and forcing it to slow. The fighter turns to avoid a collision and hurtles straight towards the rocks, which tower like sentinels. Bond throws her a parachute, an essential piece of safety equipment in emergency situations. A red warning light shows generator failure, indicating a critical loss of electrical power. She opens the outside door for Bond, who gropes for his chute, then hauls on the stick to get out of the plane over the hill, a maneuver demanding immense concentration. As the two aircraft nearly collide, Bond raises the nose, gaining as much height as possible, a last-ditch effort to extend their flight. Cargo strains in its straps, which snap back towards Camille, reminding her of the seriousness of their situation. Both propellers give out under the strain, signaling the end of their flight capabilities. Bond drops down the vertical fuselage to Camille, grabs her, and they tumble out into space in a daring mid-air escape. He lets go of her parachute and dives for her as they and the plane continue to fall, showcasing his unparalleled courage. M sits stony-faced in MI6 headquarters, monitoring the mission's progress. They are in the sunless steps of the sinkhole, an underground cavern shaped by natural erosion over centuries. He puts his jacket around her shoulders, stands, thinks for a moment about their next move, and then turns to her. They stare at one another until Bond breaks eye contact. She gives a small nod, indicating silent understanding. He holds out his hand, she takes it and pulls herself up. They trudge through the chilly, rocky shadows and come to a rockfall, a natural barricade formed by fallen stones. Bond kicks at some of the stones and picks one up, starting to climb up the rockfall, assessing its stability. He comes to the top and pauses, seeing a huge underground lake, an unexpected oasis in the desolate landscape. They walk down a tunnel with the roof held up by wooden supports, indicating human intervention to prevent collapses. People cluster around, queuing for water, a scarce and precious resource, and argue amongst themselves. A man climbs up to peer into the well, but it is dry, a testament to drought conditions afflicting the area. A standpipe stops dribbling, marking the end of even this limited water supply. The bus arrives at the dying town, its name long forgotten by outsiders. A small group of people, joined by Bond and Camille, get on board. The bus's red tail lights shine through the dusty environment, a reminder of the town's decay. Covered in dust, they arrive at the Grand Hotel, a once-luxurious establishment now in decline. He heads unhurriedly upstairs, makes his way across the landing, and approaches the door of his room, pushing it open with a sense of foreboding. He bursts into the bedroom, finding Fields' body on the bed covered in black oil, a chilling signature of their adversaries. He is frisked and escorted out but then breaks another's knee and lays out a third, using his training in hand-to-hand combat. He grabs the keys, unlocks his handcuffs, and frisks his would-be captors with practiced efficiency. As the lift doors open, he cocks the automatic, a reliable Walther PPK, and calmly slips it into the waistband of his trousers at the small of his back, ready for whatever comes next.

He throws her a parachute. A red warning light shows generator failure. She opens the outside door for Bond who gropes for his chute then hauls on the stick to get out of the plane over the hill. As the two aircraft nearly collide Bond raises the nose gaining as much height as possible. Cargo strains in its straps which snap back towards Camille. Both propellers give out under the strain. Bond drops down the vertical fuselage to Camille grabs her and they tumble out into space. He let us go of her parachute and dives for her as they and the plane continue to fall. M sits stonyfaced. They are in the sunless steps of the sinkhole. He puts his jacket around her shoulders stands thinks for a moment and then turns to her. They stare at one another until Bond breaks eye contact. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. She gives a small nod. He holds out his hand she takes it and pulls herself up. They trudge through the chilly rocky shadows and come to a rockfall. Bond kicks at some of the stones and picks one up starting to climb up the rockfall. He comes to the top and pauses seeing a huge underground lake. They walk down a tunnel with the roof held up by wooden supports. People cluster around queuing for water and argue amongst themselves. A man climbs up to peer into the well but it is dry. A standpipe stops dribbling. The bus arrives at the dying town. A small group of people joined by Bond and Camille get on board. The bus's red tail lights shine through the dusty environment. Covered in dust they arrive at the Grand Hotel. He heads unhurriedly upstairs makes his way across the landing and approaches the door of his room pushing it open. He bursts into the bedroom finding Fields' body on the bed covered in black oil. He is frisked and escorted out but then breaks another's knee and lays out a third. He grabs the keys unlocks his handcuffs and frisks his wouldbe captors. As the lift doors open he cocks the automatic and calmly slips it into the waistband of his trousers at the small of his back.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~50%)
test_cases.description: She looks out of a side window as rocks and crags skim past. Daylight falls through holes punched in the fuselage by another burst from the fighter. Bond nurses the stricken aircraft as the hunter swoops in for the kill and eases the floor throttle forward. The dying engines belch smoke enveloping the fighter's cockpit. The transport moves to avoid the smoke trapping the fighter between the larger plane and forcing it to slow. The fighter turns to avoid a collision and hurtles straight towards the rocks. He throws her a parachute. A red warning light shows generator failure. She opens the outside door for Bond who gropes for his chute then hauls on the stick to get out of the plane over the hill. The bus arrives at the dying town. A small group of people joined by Bond and Camille get on board. The bus's red tail lights shine through the dusty environment. He grabs the keys unlocks his handcuffs and frisks his wouldbe captors. As the lift doors open he cocks the automatic and calmly slips it into the waistband of his trousers at the small of his back.

Bond nurses the stricken aircraft as the hunter swoops in for the kill and eases the floor throttle forward. The dying engines belch smoke enveloping the fighter's cockpit. test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: She peers out of a sunroof as trees and valleys glide nearby. Moonlight filters through cracks pierced in the dome by another volley from the destroyer. Frost pets the wounded ship as the predator dives in for the strike and nudges the ceiling lever backward. The faltering turbines spew fog, engulfing the destroyer’s bridge. The barge shifts to dodge the fog, trapping the destroyer between the larger vessel and forcing it to halt. The destroyer veers to sidestep a crash and barrels straight towards the trees. He tosses her a life jacket. A green caution beacon signals motor breakdown. She unlatches the inner gate for Frost, who fumbles for his jacket, then yanks at the wheel to exit the ship over the ridge. As the two vessels narrowly miss, Frost tilts the prow, gaining as much altitude as feasible. Freight pulls at its ties, which ricochet back towards Clara. Both turbines quit under the weight. Frost slides down the slanted dome to Clara, seizes her, and they plunge out into the air. He lets free of her life jacket and lunges for her as they and the vessel continue to descend. L sits unmoved. They find themselves in the shadowed corridors of the abyss. He drapes his coat around her arms, rises, reflects for a second, and then turns to her. They gaze at one another until Frost drops his gaze. She offers a slight nod. He extends his arm, she accepts it and pulls herself upright. They slog through the frigid, stony hollows and come to a landslide. Frost nudges at some of the pebbles and clutches one, beginning to ascend the landslide. He reaches the summit and stops, spotting an enormous subterranean ocean. They trek through a passageway with the ceiling supported by metal beams. Figures crowd together, lining up for air, and bicker amongst themselves. A woman scales up to glance into the pit, but it is empty. A faucet halts trickling. The van approaches the fading village. A handful of figures, accompanied by Frost and Clara, climb aboard. The van's blue brake lights gleam through the gritty atmosphere. Enveloped in grime, they reach the Central Lodge. He ventures leisurely downstairs, navigates the corridor, and nears the entrance of his chamber, shoving it open. He storms into the living area, discovering Reed's form on the couch coated in silver paint. He is paged and led outside but then twists another's wrist and flattens a fourth. He snatches the passes, unclasps his leg irons, and searches his would-be captors. As the staircase gate opens, he clicks the revolver and stealthily tucks it into the pocket of his vest at the top of his chest.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Bond navigates a failing aircraft through smoke while being pursued by a fighter jet. As they avoid a collision, Bond throws a parachute to Camille. Despite a warning light indicating generator failure, Bond and Camille exit the plane together just before it crashes. On the ground, they find themselves in a sunless sinkhole. Bond helps Camille, and they traverse rocky terrain to discover a dried-up well and a standpipe. They join others on a bus to a dying town. Upon arrival at the Grand Hotel, Bond discovers Fields' body covered in oil in his room. He is frisked and led away but overpowers his captors, retrieves keys, and frees himself. As the elevator doors open, he readies his weapon and discreetly tucks it away.
